data.lyric:
[ti:Hailey's Comet]
[ar:Billie Eilish]
[al:Happier Than Ever]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Halley's Comet - Billie Eilish
[00:10.28]Lyrics by：Billie Eilish O'Connell/Finneas O'Connell
[00:20.57]Composed by：Billie Eilish O'Connell/Finneas O'Connell
[00:30.86]I don't want it
[00:35.26]
[00:36.78]And I don't want to want you
[00:42.40]
[00:43.96]But in my dreams I seem to be more honest
[00:49.36]
[00:50.57]And I must admit you've been in quite a few
[00:55.60]
[00:57.89]Halley's Comet
[01:02.28]
[01:03.74]Comes around more than I do
[01:09.38]
[01:10.91]But you're all it takes for me to break a promise
[01:17.33]
[01:18.38]Silly me to fall in love with you
[01:22.66]
[01:24.48]I haven't slept since Sunday
[01:27.81]Midnight for me is 3AM for you
[01:37.90]But my sleepless nights are better
[01:41.32]With you the nights could never be alone ooh ooh-ooh ooh
[01:51.39]I was good at feeling nothin' now I'm hopeless
[01:56.95]
[01:58.69]What a drag to love you like I do ooh-ooh ooh ooh ooh ooh
[02:09.34]
[02:11.85]Ooh-ooh-ooh ooh ooh-ooh ooh-ooh
[02:16.60]
[02:18.16]I've been loved before but right now in this moment
[02:23.31]
[02:25.27]I feel more and more like I was made for you
[02:30.02]
[02:35.63]For you
[02:36.85]
[03:02.61]I'm sitting in my brother's room
[03:08.40]
[03:12.64]Haven't slept in a week or two or two
[03:19.30]
[03:20.48]I think I might have fallen in love
[03:28.12]
[03:29.92]What am I to do
data.trans:
[ti:Hailey's Comet]
[ar:Billie Eilish]
[al:Happier Than Ever]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯音乐享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:10.28]//
[00:20.57]//
[00:30.86]我万分不愿
[00:35.26]
[00:36.78]不愿对你这样日思夜想
[00:42.40]
[00:43.96]但当我进入梦乡 梦中的我似乎更加坦诚
[00:49.36]
[00:50.57]我必须承认 你万里挑一
[00:55.60]
[00:57.89]哈雷彗星
[01:02.28]
[01:03.74]出现的都比我频繁
[01:09.38]
[01:10.91]但只有你能够让我违背誓言
[01:17.33]
[01:18.38]愚蠢如我 为你坠入爱河
[01:22.66]
[01:24.48]上周日起 我就夜夜辗转反侧
[01:27.81]我的半夜 对你来说是凌晨3点
[01:37.90]但你能填补我难眠的夜晚
[01:41.32]你的存在 让我的夜晚不再孤单
[01:51.39]我曾经很擅长与虚无共处 现在我是如此绝望
[01:56.95]
[01:58.69]我这样别扭地爱着你 真的让自己精疲力尽
[02:09.34]
[02:11.85]//
[02:16.60]
[02:18.16]我也曾有过恋爱经历 但现在 此时此刻
[02:23.31]
[02:25.27]我越来越感觉我是你的命中注定
[02:30.02]
[02:35.63]是你的
[02:36.85]
[03:02.61]我坐在我哥哥的房间里
[03:08.40]
[03:12.64]一两个星期没有合过眼
[03:19.30]
[03:20.48]我想我或许已经坠入了爱河
[03:28.12]
[03:29.92]我该何去何从
